BiblioEntry.Title: The growth mechanism of zinc oxide and hydrozincite : a study using electron microscopies and in situ SAXS
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The growth mechanism of zinc oxide and hydrozincite : a study using electron microscopies and in situ SAXS / Marko Bitenc ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: a study using electron microscopies and in situ SAXS
BiblioEntry.Abstract: The growth mechanism of ZnO is investigated by a combination of electron microscopy and in situ small-angle X-ray scattering (SAXS). The particles are prepared by the precipitation of zinc nitrate with urea. Depending on the reaction conditions, ZnO, hydrozincite, or a mixture of both phases is detected in our system. The molecular precursors and complexation reactions ofthe formation process are numerically predicted by the partial-charge model.The condensation and complexation reactions lead to the formation of nanoparticle building units up to a size of 10 nm. Afterwards, the nanoparticles immediately self-assemble into micro-sized particles
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: ZnO /electron microscopy /SAXS

BiblioEntry.Title: Interplay between the structural and magnetic probes in the elucidation of the structure of a novel 2D layered [V [sub] 4O [sub] 4(OH) [sub] 2(O [sub] 2CC [sub] 6H [sub] 4CO [sub] 2) [sub] 4] DMF
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Interplay between the structural and magnetic probes in the elucidation of the structure of a novel 2D layered [V [sub] 4O [sub] 4(OH) [sub] 2(O [sub] 2CC [sub] 6H [sub] 4CO [sub] 2) [sub] 4] DMF / Igor Djerdj ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Abstract: The title compound has been synthesized under solvothermal conditions by reacting vanadium(V) oxytriisopropoxide with terephthalic acid in N,N-dimethylformamide. A combination of synchrotron powder diffraction, infrared spectroscopy, scanning and transmission electron microscopy, and thermal and chemical analysis elucidated the chemical, structural and microstructural features of a new 2D layered inorganic-organic framework. Due to the low-crystallinity of the final material, its crystal structure has been solved from synchrotron X-ray powder diffraction data using a direct space global optimization technique and subsequent constraint Rietveld refinement. [V4O4(OH)2(O2CC6H4CO2)4] DMF crystallizes in the monoclinic system (space group P2/m (No. 10)); cell parameters: a = 20.923(4) A, b = 5.963(4) A, c = 20.425(1) A, ß = 123.70(6)°, V = 2120.1(9) A3, Z = 2. The overall structure can be described as an array of parallel 2D layers running along [-101] direction, consisting of two types of vanadium oxidation states and coordination polyhedra: face-shared trigonal prisms (V4+) and distorted corner-shared square pyramids (V5+). Both configurations form independent parallel chains oriented along the 2-fold symmetry crystallographic b-axis mutually interlinked with terephthalate ligands in a monodentate mode perpendicular to it. The morphology of the compound exhibits long nanofibers, with the growth direction along the layered [-101] axis. The magnetic susceptibility measurements show that the magnetic properties of [V4O4(OH)2(O2CC6H4CO2)4] DMF can be described by a linear antiferromagnetic chain model, with the isotropic exchange interaction of J = -75 K between the nearest V4+ neighbours of S = 1/2.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: struktura snovi /magnetizem /geometrična struktura

BiblioEntry.Title: Computations with half-range Chebyshev polynomials
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Computations with half-range Chebyshev polynomials / Bojan Orel, Andrej Perne

BiblioSet.Title: Journal of Computational and Applied Mathematics
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Journal of Computational and Applied Mathematics

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku predstavljamo učinkovito konstrukcijo dveh neklasičnih družin ortogonalnih polinomov. Tako imenovane poldomenske polinome Čebiševa prve in druge vrste je prvi uvedel Huybrechs v članku iz leta 2010. Nadalje obravnavamo nekatere lastnosti teh polinomov. Vsako integrabilno funkcijo lahko predstavimo s tako imenovano poldomensko Čebišev-Fourier-ovo vrsto, ki je sestavljena iz sinusov in kosinusov organiziranih z zgoraj omenjenimi polinomi. Drugi del članka je posvečen učinkovitemu izračunu koeficientov odvodov odrezane vrste in koeficientov produkta dveh odrezanih vrst. V ta namen zgradimo dve matriki: matriko odvodov in multiplikacijsko matriko.

An efficient construction of two non-classical families of orthogonal polynomials is presented in the paper. The so-called half-range Chebyshev polynomials of the first and second kinds were first introduced by Huybrechs (2010). Some properties of these polynomials are also shown. Every integrable function can be represented as an infinite series of sines and cosines of these polynomials, the so-called half-range Chebyshev-Fourier (HCF) series. The second part of the paper is devoted to the efficient computation of derivatives and multiplication of the truncated HCF series, where two matrices are constructed for this purpose: the differentiation and the multiplication matrix.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /numerična analiza /poldomenski polinomi Čebiševa /ortogonalni polinomi /tričlenska rekurzivna formula /matrika odvodov /multiplikacijska matrika

BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Accumulation of global error in Lie group methods for linear ordinary differential equations [Elektronski vir] / Bojan Orel

BiblioSet.Title: Electronic transactions on numerical analysis
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Electronic transactions on numerical analysis [Elektronski vir]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Pogledamo, kako se lokalne napake nabirajo v globalno napako pri metodah Liejevih grup za reševanje linearnih navadnih diferencialnih enačb. Pojma lokalne in globalne napake moramo posplošiti, da je uporaben znotraj okvirja Liejevih grup in algeber. Razvijemo formule za spremljanje globalne napake in pokažemo njihovo delovanje na numeričnih primerih.

In this paper we investigate how the local errors accumulate to the global error in Lie group methods for linear ODEs. The concept of the local and global errors has to be redefined to fit in the framework of Lie groups and algebras. Formulas for tracking the global error are proposed and demonstrated on numerical examples.

BiblioSet.Title: Solar energy materials and solar cells
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Solar energy materials and solar cells

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Cerium vanadate films on glass substrate were obtained by sol-gel process. The morphology of these nanostructured and porous films was studied by grazing-incidence small-angle X-ray scattering (GISAXS) at synchrotron ELETTRA, Trieste, Italy. The aim of the GISAXS study was to investigate the changes in grain sizes due to the temperature evolution with three different time intervals (5, 15 and 30 min) of annealing at 673 K. We found that the effects of the different times of annealing are different for surface and bulk properties of this V/Ce oxide.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: kemija materialov /nanodelci /tanki filmi /karakterizacija /ozkokotno rentgensko sipanje

BiblioEntry.Title: Complexity theory for Lie-group solvers
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Complexity theory for Lie-group solvers / Elena Calledoni ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Commencing with a brief survey of Lie-group theory and differential equations evolving on Lie groups, we describe a number of numerical algorithms designed to respect Lie-group structure: Runge-Kutta-Munthe-Kaas schemes, Fer and Magnus expansions. This is followed by derivation of the computational cost of Fer and Magnus expansions, whose conclusion is that for order four, six, and eight an appropriately diskretized Magnus method is always cheaper then a Fer method of the same order. Each Lie-group method of the kind surveyed in yhis paper requires the computation of a matrix exponential. Classical methods, e.g. Krylov-subspace and rational approximants, may fail to map elements in a Lie algebra to a Lie group. Therefore, we survey a number of approximants based on the splitting approach and demonstrate that their cost is compatible (and often superior) to classical methods.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /numerična analiza /diferencialne enačbe /numerične metode /Liejeve grupe /računska zahtevnost
mathematics /numerical analysis /differential equations /numerical methods /Lie groups /complexity /matrix exponential

BiblioEntry.Title: Extrapolated Magnus methods
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Extrapolated Magnus methods / Bojan Orel
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Opisana je uporaba ekstrapolacije z Magnusovo metodo za reševanje sistema linearnih diferencialnih enačb. Glavna ideja je posplošitev pojma ekstrapolacije pri simetričnih metodah za numerično reševanje navadnih diferencialnih enačb, kjer vsak ekstrapolacijski korak poveča red metode za 2.

We describe the use of extrapolation with Magnus methods for solution of a system of linear differential equations. The idea is a generalization of extrapolation with symmetric methods for the numerical solution of ODEs, where each extrapolation step increases the order of the method by 2.

BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Symmetric pz-restricted approximants to the exponential function / Bojan Orel, Syvert Paul Nørsett
BiblioEntry.Abstract: ▫$pz$▫-omejene aproksimacije eksponentne funkcije so v tesni zvezi z numeričnimi metodami za sisteme simplektičnih diferencialnih enačb. V tem članku je opisanih nekaj njihovih lastnosti.
▫$pz$▫-restricted approximations to the exponential function are closely related to numerical methods for symplectic systems of differential equations. This paper describes some of their properties.

BiblioEntry.Title: Improvement of methods for molecular dynamics integration
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Improvement of methods for molecular dynamics integration / Dušanka Janežič, Bojan Orel
BiblioEntry.Abstract: An application of symplectic implicit Runge-Kutta integration schemes, the s-stage Gauss-Legendre Runge-Kutta (GLRK) methods of order ▫$2s$▫, for the numerical solution of molecular dynamics (MD) is described. The two-stage fourth-order GLRK method, the implicit midpoint rule, and the three-stage diagonally implicit RK method of order four are studied. The fixed-point iteration was used for solving the resulting nonlinear system of equations. The algorithms were applied to a complex systems of ▫$N$▫ particles interacting through a Lennard-Jones potential. The proposed symplectic methods for MD integration permit a wide range of time steps, are higly accurate and stable, and are thus suitable for the MD integration.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /kemija /numerična analiza /molekularna dinamika /hamiltonski sistemi
mathematics /chemistry /numerical analysis /molecular dynamics /Hamiltonian systems

BiblioEntry.Title: Parallel Runge-Kutta methods with real eigenvalues
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Parallel Runge-Kutta methods with real eigenvalues / Bojan Orel
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Članek opisuje paralelno uporabo Runge-Kutta metod z realnimi lastnimi vrednostmi. Opisana je konstrukcija kolokacijskih metod, kot tudi metod s stabilnostno funkcijo pod glavno diagonalo Padejeve tabele. Predloženi sta metoda za oceno lokalne napake in način uporabe teh metod na vzporednih računalnikih.

This paper describes a parallel implementation of implicit Runge-Kutta methods with real eigenvalues. The construction of collocation-type methods as well as of methods with the stability function below the main diagonal of the Pade tableau is described. A method for estimating the local error and an implementation of these methods on parallel machines are proposed.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /numerična analiza /navadne diferencialne enačbe /racionalne aproksimacije /metode Runge-Kutta
mathematics /numerical analysis /ordinary differential equations /rational approximations /Runge-Kutta methods

BiblioEntry.Title: Implicit Runge-Kutta method for molecular dynamics integration
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Implicit Runge-Kutta method for molecular dynamics integration / Dušanka Janežič, Bojan Orel

BiblioSet.Title: Journal of chemical information and computer sciences
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Journal of chemical information and computer sciences

BiblioEntry.Abstract: An implicit Runge-Kutta (RK) integration scheme, the two-stage 4th order Gauss-Legendre Runge-Kutta (GLRK) method, for numerucal solution of molecular dynamics equations is described. An estimate of the initial guess for the starting value of the fixed-point iteration is based on the typical particle frequency. The algorithm was applied to the harmonic oscilator and compared to various algorithms for numerical integration of equations of motion. The algorithn was also applied to a complex system of 256 particles interacting through a Lennard-Jones potential, and compared to a summed form of the Verlet algorithm. The proposed implicit RK method, which permits a wide range of time steps, is highly accurate and stable and is thus suitable for the molecular dynamics integration.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /kemija /numerična analiza /molekularna dinamika /hamiltonski sistemi
mathematics /chemistry /numerical analysis /molecular dynamics /Hamiltonian systems

BiblioEntry.Title: Real pole approximations to the exponential function
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Real pole approximations to the exponential function / Bojan Orel
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku so opisane racionalne aproksimacije eksponentne funkcije z realnimi ne nujno različnimi poli. S pomočjo ortogonalnosti je pokazano, da so ničle kolokacijskih polinomov ustreznih Runge-Kutta metod realne, enostavne in pozitivne. Dokazano je, da je najmanjša konstanta napake dosežena pri Norsettovih omejenih Padéjevih aproksimacijah. Opisano je nekaj rezultatov v zvezi s sprejemljivostjo.

Rational approximations to the exponential function with real, not necessarily distinct poles are studied in this paper. The orthogonality relation is established in order to show that the zeros of the collocation polynomial of the corresponding Runge-Kutta method are all real, simple and positive. It is proven, that approximants with the smallest error constant are the restricted Padé approximants of Norsett. Some results concerning acceptability properties are given.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /aproksimacije /numerična analiza /racionalne aproksimacije /ortogonalnost /sprejemljivost
mathematics /approximation /numerical analysis /rational approximations /orthogonality /acceptability

BiblioEntry.Title: Numerično reševanje diferencialnih enačb, Eulerjeva metoda
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Numerično reševanje diferencialnih enačb / Bojan Orel. Eulerjeva metoda
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku je opisana najpreprostejša metoda za reševanje sistema navadnih diferencialnih enačb: Eulerjeva metoda. Ob njej bomo spoznali osnovne pojme, ki nastopajo v numeričnem reševanju diferencialnih enačb, kot so lokalna in globalna napaka metode ter stabilnost.

In this paper the simplest method for solving systems of ordinary differential equations, Euler's method, is described. Some basic ideas connected with numerical solution of differential equations, such as local and global errors and stability will be explained with this simple method.

BiblioEntry.Title: Numerično reševanje diferencialnih enačb, Linearne veččlenske metode
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Numerično reševanje diferencialnih enačb / Bojan Orel. Linearne veččlenske metode
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku so opisane lastnosti linearnih veččlenskih metod (LVM) za reševanje sistemov navadnih diferencialnih enačb. Podrobneje sta podani dve družini Adamsovih metod, nato pa je zbranih nekaj osnovnih rezultatov o konvergenci splošnih LVM. Poudarjen je pomen absolutne stabilnosti in naštetih nekaj problemov, ki nastopajo pri uporabi LVM za reševanje togih problemov.

Some properties of linear multistep methods (LMM) are presented in this paper. Two families of Adam's methods are described and some basic results on the convergence of general LMM are outlined. The importance of absolute stability is presented together with some problems arising in solving stiff problems.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Qualitative properties of numerical solutions of ordinary differential equations (ODEs) attracted a lot of attention recently. The term "Geometric integrator" means a method that is designed not just to minimize (in the classical sense) the numerical error but also to render correctly the invariants (i.e. the geometry) of the solution. We review briefly recent advances in numerical methods that advance solutions of ODEs on Lie groups. In particular we mention Runge-Kutta Munthe-Kaas methods for solving general nonlinear ODEs and Magnus methods for the solution of linear ODEs.

proceedings

BiblioEntry.Abstract: A parallel implementation for a multi-implicint Runge-Kutta method (MIRK) with real eigenvalues is decribed. The parallel method is analysed and the algorithm is devised. For the problem with ▫$d$▫ domains, the amount of work within the ▫$s$▫-stage MIRK method, associated with the solution of system, is proportional to ▫$(sd^)2$▫, in contrast to the simple implicit finite difference method (IFD) where the amount of work is proportional to ▫$d^3$▫. However, it is shown that s-stage MIRK admits much greater time steps for the same order of error. Additionally, the proposed parallelisation transforms the system of the dimension ▫$sd$▫ to ▫$s$▫ independent sub-systems of dimension ▫$d$▫. The amount of work for the sequential solution of such systems is proportional to ▫$sd^3$▫. The described parallel algorithm enables the solving of each of the s subsystems on a separate processor; finally, the amount of work is again ▫$d^3$▫, but the profit of a larger time step still remains. To test the theory, a comparative example of the 3-D heat transfer in a human heart with 64 3 domains is shown and numerically calculated by 3-stage MIRK.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /numerična anliza /numerične metode /začetni problemi /metode Runge-Kutta
mathematics /numerical analysis /numerical methods /initial value problems /Runge-Kutta methods

BiblioEntry.Title: Comparison of 3- and 5-stage multi-implicit Runge-Kutta methods
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Comparison of 3- and 5-stage multi-implicit Runge-Kutta methods / Boštjan Slivnik, Roman Trobec, Bojan Orel

BiblioSet.Title: Proceedings of the International Workshop Parallel Numerics '96, Gozd Martuljek, Slovenia, September 11 - 13, 1996
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Proceedings of the International Workshop Parallel Numerics '96, Gozd Martuljek, Slovenia, September 11 - 13, 1996 / R. Trobec ... [et al.] (eds.)

BiblioEntry.Abstract: The well known coarse-grain parallelisation of the multi-implicit 3-stage Runge-Kutta method (3-MIRK) with real eigenvalues is compared with the new 5-stage MIRK method. Assume that a problem contains ▫$d$▫ spatially discretised domains. It was previously shown that the s-MIRK method gives a system of equations of the dimension ▫$sd$▫ that can be transformed into ▫$s$▫ independed sub-systems of the dimansion ▫$d$▫. Each od sub-systems can be solved in parallel on a separate processor, and consenquently, the amount of work for the solution of the s-MIRK system is ▫$d^3$▫, which is the same order of complexity as for the simple implicit methods. Our hypothesis was that with the same algorithm the greather time step will be allowed in the 5-MIRK method for the same reliability. The amount of sequential calculation is increased by a factor of ▫$(5/3)^3$▫. On the other hand, with the same parallel algorithm the same problem could be solved with the 5-MIRK method on five workstations on a shorter time as with the 3-MIRK method on three workstations. The raason lies in the fact that a more complicated method, which can be performed perfectly in parallel, offers a greater time step. In other words, two additional internal approximations are calculated in parallel, on two additionally workstations, in order to combine better approximation for the next time step. To test our hypothesis, the calculation results of the 3-D heat transfer in the human heart with ▫$32^3$▫ domains is shown.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /računalništvo /numerična analiza /numerične metode /paralelno računanje /metode Runge-Kutta
mathematics /numerical analysis /computer science /numerical methods /parallel computing /Runge-Kutta methods

BiblioEntry.Abstract: A parallel implementation for multi-implicit Runge-Kutta methods with real eigenvalues is described. The parallel method is analysed and the algorithm is devised. For the problem with ▫$d$▫ domains, the amount within the ▫$s$▫-stage Runge-Kutta method, associated with the solution of system, is proportional to ▫$(sd)^3$▫. The proposed parallelisation transforms the above systems to ▫$s$▫ independed sub-systems of dimension ▫$d$▫. The amount of work for the solution of such systems is proportional to ▫$sd^3$▫. The solution of ▫$d$▫ dimensional sub-systems is the most complex operation within the Runge-Kutta method. The described parallel algorithm is enabled to solve each sub-system on a separate processor or on a separate set of processors.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Opisana je metoda za konstrukcijo krožno-eksaktnih formul za reševanje problema iskanja trajektorije. Na ta način lahko priredimo večino linearnih veččlenskih formul. S to kombinacijo eksplicitnih in implicitnih metod lahko konstruiramo tudi družino krožno-eksaktnih metod tipa prediktor-korektor.

A method for constructing circularly exact formulas for the solution of trajectory problems is presented. Most of the linear multistep formulas can bemodified in this way. Also a family of circularly exact predictor-corrector mathods can be constructed.

BiblioEntry.Title: An application oriented introduction to curves
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: An application oriented introduction to curves / Neža Mramor-Kosta and Bojan Orel

AuthorGroup.CorpAuthor: Special SEFI European Seminar on Geometry in Engineering Education, August 25-29, 1997, Bratislava - Smolenice, Slovakia

BiblioSet.Title: Proceedings
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Proceedings / Special SEFI European Seminar on Geometry in Engineering Education

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Že od nekdaj so krivulje zanimive po eni strani kot matematični objekti, po drugi strani pa kot orodje pri modeliranju in reševanju tehničnih problemov. V prispevku poskušamo podati kratko predstavitev krivulj s poudarkom na njihovi uporabi v tehniki.

Curves have been on one hand the object at mathematical studies and on the other hand a tool for solving technical problems for modelling since the very beginning of mathematics. Our idea is that curves should be introduced to tehnical students as mathematical objects, but there should be a strong emphasis on applications. The purpose of this contribution is to give a short outline of such an introduction to curves in 2D and 3D.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /geometrija /parametrizirana krivulja /implicitna ravninska krivulja /Peanova krivulja
mathematics /geometry /parametrized curve /space filling curve /implicit plane curve

BiblioEntry.Title: Runge-Kutta methods with real eigenvalues : dissertation = Metode Runge-Kutta z realnimi lastnimi vrednostmi : doktorska disertacija
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Runge-Kutta methods with real eigenvalues : dissertation = Metode Runge-Kutta z realnimi lastnimi vrednostmi : doktorska disertacija / Bojan Orel
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: dissertation
doktorska disertacija
BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : [B.Orel], 1991

Notes.Dissertation: Univerza v Ljubljani, VDO Fakulteta za naravoslovje in tehnologijo, VTO Matematika in mehanika

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V delu prikažemo večkratno implicitne Runge-Kutta metode za numerično reševanje sistemov togih navadnih diferencialnih enačb na vzporednih računalnikih. Proučujemo lastnosti racionalnih aproksimacij eksponentne funkcije z realnimi poli. Konstruiramo novo družino biortogonalnih polinomov, ki so naravna posplošitev klasičnih Laguerrovih polinomov. Z njihovo pomočjo kasneje pridemo do racionalnih aproksimacij z različnimi realnimi poli. Dokažemo, da so vse njihove ničle realne, pozitivne in različne. Koncept "sendviča z realnimi poli" posplošimo na poddiagonalne aproksimacije, nato pa dokažemo domnevo o najmanjši vrednosti konstante napake. Rezultati A-sprejemljivosti, zbrani v tabeli, razširjajo poznane omejitve, ki jih postavlja zahteva po A-sprejemljivosti, na poddiagonalne aproksimacije. Na podlagi teh aproksimacij razvijemo večkratno implicitne Runge-Kitta metode. Večkratno implicitne metode, katerih stabilnostna funkcija leži na glavni diagonali Padéjeve tabele, lahko konstruiramo s pomočjo kolokacije. Metode s stabilnostno funkcijo pod glavno diagonalo Padéjeve tabele pa niso kolokacijske. Problem izračunavanja njihovih koeficientov rešimo s primerno modifikacijo konstrukcije s kolokacijo. Lokalno napako metode ocenimo s tehniko vgnezdenih metod: ▫$s$▫-stopenjska metoda je vsebovana v ▫$s+1$▫-stopenjski metodi višjega reda. Pokažemo, kako lahko vsako ▫$s$▫-stopenjsko L-stabilno metodo reda ▫$s$▫ vgnezdimo v ▫$s+1$▫-stopenjsko metodo reda ▫$s+2$▫.

We study Runge-Kutta methods with real eigenvalues for the solution of stiff initial value problems on parallel machines. Rational approximations to the exponential function are discussed first. A new family of biorthogonal polynomials is constructed as a basis of rational approximations with distinct real nodes. This biorthogonal polynomials are a natural generalization of the classic Laguerre polynomials. It is proved tyhat their zeros are all real, positive and distinct. The concept of the "real pole sandwich" is generalized to the subdiagonal approximations and the conjecture on the least value of the error constant is proved. The results on the study of A-acceptability of real pole rational approximations extend the known A-acceptability barriers bellow the main diagonal of the Padé tableau. Runge-Kutta methods which are based on the real pole approximations are studied. Multi-implicit Runge-Kutta methods with the stability function from the main diagonal of the Padé tableau can be constructed by collocation. Methods with the stability function below the main diagonal are not collocation type and the problem of calculating their coefficients was solved with a proper modification of the collocation-type construction. The local error estimate is provided by the use of embedding technique: an ▫$s$▫-stage method is embedded within an ▫$s+1$▫-stage error estimating method with order of accuracy greater than the order of embedded method. It is shown, that any ▫$s$▫-stage L-acceptable method of order ▫$s$▫ can be embedded within an ▫$s+1$▫-stage method of order ▫$s+2$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Stabilnost numeričnih metod za reševanje navadnih diferencialnih enačb : magistrsko delo
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Stabilnost numeričnih metod za reševanje navadnih diferencialnih enačb : magistrsko delo / Orel Bojan
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: magistrsko delo
BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : [B. Orel], 1982

Notes.Dissertation: Univ. Ljubljana, FNT Matematika in mehanika, Raziskovalna smer

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V delu so zbrani nekateri rezultati v zvezi s stabilnostjo numeričnih metod za reševanje sistemov navadnih diferencialnih enačb prvega reda. Opisan je razred metod in navedeni so glavni rezultati v zvezi s konvergenco, ničelno in šibko stabilnostjo. Na koncu je s pomočjo sprejemljivosti racionalnih aproksimacij eksponentne funkcije karkteriziramo A-stabilnost nekaterih enočlenskih metod.

Some results concerning stability of numerical methods for systems of ordinary first order differential equations are collected. A class of methods is described and main results concerning zero-stability, convergence and weak stability are given. At the end, A-stability of some one-step methods is characterized by acceptability of rational approximations.

BiblioEntry.Title: Numerična in računalniška matematika. Del 5, Stabilnost metod Runge-Kutta z realnimi lastnimi vrednostmi

Publisher.PublisherName: Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1991
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naloga obravnava stabilnost racionalnih aproksimacij eksponentne funkcije z realnimi, ne nujno različnimi poli, ki so pomembne pri konstrukciji metod Runge-Kutta z realnimi lastnimi vrednostmi. S pomočjo teorije biortogonalnih polinomov je dokazano, da so ničle ustreznih kolokacijskih polinomov vse realne, pozitivne in enostavne. Študij napake teh aproksimacij pokaže, da konstanta napake doseže minimum v primeru, ko so vsi poli racionalne aproksimacije realni. Posebna pozornost je posvečena tudi študiju sprejemljivosti omenjenih aproksimacij.

Rational approximations to the exponential function with real, not necessarily distinct poles, which are important for the construction of real Runge-Kutta methods were studied in this project. The biorthogonality relation is established in order to show that the zeros of the corresponding polynomial are all real, positive and distinct. It is proven, that approximations with the error constant has its minimum when all of the poles are equal. Special attention was paid to the study of A-acceptability of these approximations.

BiblioEntry.Title: Real pole approximations to the exponential function
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Real pole approximations to the exponential function / Bojan Orel
BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Trondheim : Norges Tekniske Høgskole, 1990
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V raziskavi so opisane racionalne aproksimacije eksponentne funkcije z realnimi, ne nujno različnimi poli. S pomočjo ortogonalne relacije je pokazano, da so ničle kolokacijskega polinoma ustrezne metode Runge-Kutta vse realne, enostavne in pozitivne. Pokazano je, da so aproksimacije z najmanjšo konstanto napake omejene Padéjeve aproksimacije. Dodani so nekateri rezultati v zvezi s sprejemljivostjo.

Rational approximations to the exponential function with real, not necessaryly distinct poles are studied in this paper. The orthogonality relation is established in order to show that the zeros of the collacation polynomial of the corresponding Runge-Kutta method are all real, simple and positive. It is proven, that approximations with the smallest error constant are the restricted Padé approximations. Some results concerning acceptability properties are given.

BiblioEntry.Title: Verjetnostni račun in statistika, Slučajne mere subordinatorskega tipa
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Verjetnostni račun in statistika. Slučajne mere subordinatorskega tipa / nosilec Mihael Perman ; sodelavca Janko Gravner, Bojan Orel

Publisher.PublisherName: Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1990
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naraščajoči slučajni proces ▫$(Y_t:0\le t\le 1)$▫ lahko razumemo kot porazdelitveno funkcijo slučajne mere na enotskem intervalu. V našem primeru se omejujemo le na slučajne mere, katerih porazdelitvena funkcija je normaliziran subordinator. Tak slučajni proces je oblike ▫$(\frac{\xi_t}{\xi_1} : 0\le t \le 1)$▫, kjer je ▫$(\xi_t:t\ge 0)$▫ subordinator, torej proces z neodvisnimi, stacionarnimi in nenegativnimi prirastki, ki narašča le v skokih. Namen naloge je bil poiskati porazdelitev največjega atoma v slučajni meri subordinatorskega tipa, ali bolj splošno, porazdelitev ▫$n$▫ največjih atomov v tej meri. Pomembno vprašanje je tudi, kdaj je dana slučajna mera subordinatorskega tipa. V letošnjem letu je raziskovalcem uspelo najti integralske enačbe za gostoto porazdelitve ▫$n$▫ največjih atomov v slučajni meri subordinatorskega tipa. Te enačbe imajo eksplicitne rešitve v nekaterih primerih, posebno uspešen pa je bil ta pristop pri Dirichletovem procesu in pri stabilnih subordinatorjih. Problem karakterizacije slučajnih mer subordinatorskega tipa še ni popolnoma rešen, ugotovljeno pa je bilo nekaj novih potrebnih pogojev.

A non-decrasing process ▫$(Y_t: 0\le t\le 1)$▫ with cadlag paths can be viewed as the distribution function of a random measure. Here the research has been focused on random discrete measures arising from subordinators. The distribution function of these measures can be written as ▫$(\frac{\xi_t} {\xi_1}:0\le t\le 1)$▫ where ▫$(\xi_t:t\ge 0)$▫ is a process with independent, non-negative, stationary increments that only increase in jumps. Such processes will be referred to as subordinators without drift in the sequel. The purpose of the project was to find the distribution of the largest atom in a random measure arising form a subordinator, or, more generally, the distribution of the first ▫$n$▫ largest atoms. Another question was to find out when a given random probability measure arises from subordinators. This year the researchers were able to derive integral equations for the density of the distribution of the ▫$n$▫ largest atoms in a random measure arising from subordinators. Their approach was particularly successful in the Dirichlet case and in the stable case. The question about how to characterise random measures arising from subordinators has not yet been solved completely. A few new necessary conditions have been found, however.

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1989
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V poročilu so obravnavane nekatere lastnosti ortogonalnih in biortogonalnih polinomov. Navedeni so pogoji za njihovo eksistenco in enoličnost. Obravnavani so pogoji pri katerih so ničle realne, med seboj različne in vsebovane v nosilcu ustreznega funkcionala oz. distribucije. Posebej je obravnavana tročlenska rekurzijska formula in Gaussova integracijska formula za ortogonalne polinome. V nadaljevanju so obravnavani nelinearni singularno perturbirani robni problemi. Pregledane so nekatere lastnosti rešitev reduciranega problema in usklajenost teh rešitev z limitnimi rešitvami singularnega problema. Dodana je numerična metoda Newtonovega tipa in preizkušena na primerih.

In this report some properties of orthogonal and biorthogonal polynomials are treated. Conditions for existence and uniqueness are established. Conditions, that guaratee, that their zeros are real, distinct and within support of the underlying functional or distribution are described. The three term recurrence formula and Gauss quadrature formula are treated separately. In the next part nonlinear singular perturbed boundary value problem are described. The numerical method of Newton type is also introduced.

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1988
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prvem delu so obravnavane nekatere lastnosti metod Runge-Kutta. Podrobneje je obdelan problem implementacije implicitnih metod Runge-Kutta pri reševanju togih začetnih problemov. V drugem delu so na začetku razširjene v lanski nalogi že obdelane posebne asimptotične metode za reševanje singularnega perturbiranega problema na splošnejše probleme. V nadaljevanju je obdelana znana metoda eksponentnega tipa, ki je posebej namenjena eksponentnim problemom.

In the first part of this report some properties of Runge-Kutta methods are described. The problem of implementation of implicit Runge-Kutta methods in solution of stiff initial value problems is studied. In the beginning of the second part special asymptotical methods for the solution of singularly perturbed problems, which were studied in the last report, are applied to more general problems. Known method of the exponential type for solving nonlinear equations is described.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /numerična analiza /navadne diferencialne enačbe /začetne naloge /sistemi nelinearnih enačb /numerične metode /robni problemi
mathematics /numerical analysis /ordinary differential equations /initial value problems /systems of nonlinear equations /numerical methods /boundary value problem

BiblioEntry.Title: Numerična in računalniška matematika. Del 3, Numerične metode za stabilno reševanje problema trajektorije, singularno perturbiranih problemov in parcialnih diferencialnih enačb
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Numerična in računalniška matematika. Del 3, Numerične metode za stabilno reševanje problema trajektorije, singularno perturbiranih problemov in parcialnih diferencialnih enačb / nosilec Bojan Orel ; sodelavca Andrej Kmet, V. V. Bobkov

Publisher.PublisherName: Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1987
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prvem delu naloge so predstavljene metode tipa Runge-Kutta. Izpeljani so algebraični pogoji, ki jim morajo zadoščati koeficienti metode za določen red konsistence in navedena dva primera uporabe. V drugem delu so v začetku opisane analitične in numerične metode za reševanje singularno perturbirane Riccatijeve diferencialne enačbe z asimptotično aproksimacijo posebnih rešitev. Ocenjena je napaka aproksimacijske funkcije. Nato so te metode aplicirane na reševanje singularno perturbiranega robnega problema in dodane ter analizirane metode za asimptotično aproksimacijo posebnih partikularnih rešitev te enačbe.

In the first part of this report Runge-Kutta methods are presented. Algebraical conditions on the coefficients of the method are derived, that guarantee the method has prescribed order of consistency. This conditions are used to derive two particular RK-methods. In the beginning of the second part analitical and numerical methods for solving singularly perturbed Riccati differential equation with an asimptotical approximation of special solutions are described. Error of the approximating function is estimated. This methods are applicated on the solution of sigularly perturbed boundary value problems. Methods for asimptotical approximation of special particular solutions of this equations are analyzed.

BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Numerična in računalniška matematika. Del 6, Numerične metode za stabilno reševanje nekaterih navadnih in parcialnih diferencialnih enačb / nosilec Andrej Kmet = sodelavec Bojan Orel

Publisher.PublisherName: Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1986
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prvem delu je opisanih več metod za numerično reševanje robnega problema za navadne diferencialne enačbe drugega reda z majhnim parametrom. Pokazana je eksistenca in ocenjena napaka numerične rešitve. Podan je primer. V drugem delu sta analizirana stabilnost in red eksplicitnih in semieksplicitnih diferenčnih metod za reševanje nekaterih parcialnih diferencialnih enačb. V tretjem delu je predstavljen postopek za konstrukcijo krožno-eksaktnih metod s pomočjo ustreznih "normalnih" metod za reševanje začetnih problemov. Na koncu so dobljene krožno-eksaktne metode na konkretnih numeričnih primerih primerjane z ustreznimi "normalnimi" metodami.

In the first part some methods for numerical solution of the boundary-value problem in ordinary in ordinary differential equations of the second order with small parameter are described. The existence of the numerical solution is shown, its error is estimated and a numerical example is added. In the second part stability and order of explicit or semiexplicit difference methods for solution of some partial differential equations are analysed. In the third part a method for construction of circularly-exact trajectory solvers from "normal" methods for numerical solution of initialy-value problems is presented. At the end new circularly-exact methods are compared with respective "normal" methods.

BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Numerična in računalniška matematika. Del 5, Numerične metode za stabilno reševanje določenih sistemov diferencialnih enačb / nosilec: Bojan Orel ; sodelavca: Vladimir V. Bobkov, Andrej Kmet

Publisher.PublisherName: Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1985
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prvem delu naloge je opisanih več metod za reševanje problema iskanja trajektorije za sistem navadnih diferencialnih enačb. Dodan je algoritem za reševanje tega problema z avtomatskim prilagajanjem dolžine koraka. V drugem delu je obdelana prevedba linearne enačbe drugega reda na simetričen sistem linearnih enačb prvega reda.

In the first part of this work some methods for trajectory problem for a system of ordinary differential equations is explained. An algorithm for the solution of this problem with automatical step-controlis added. In the second part a transformation of linear equation of the second order to a linear symetric system of the first order is explained.

BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Račun temeljnih nosilcev in temeljnih plošč. Temeljni del 4 / Mladen Houška, Bojan Orel

Publisher.PublisherName: Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1985
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V nadaljevanju raziskovalne naloge, ki obravnava interakcijo zgradbe in podlage, je obravnavan primer temeljnih konstrukcij, ki jih smemo aproksimirati z ravninskim deformacijskim stanjem. Izpeljana je podajnostna matrika in enačbe za različne robne pogoje med sloji elastičnega polprostora. Podane so možnosti diagonalizacije togostne matrike podlage zaradi poenostavitve in prilagoditve manjšim računalnikom.

In the work the flexibility matrix for system of isotropic and cross anisotropic elastic horisontal layers for plane strain loading is derived. Another boundary conditions of completely frictionless contact at interface are analised. Some modifications by the rigidity matrix are applied.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: mehanika /mehanika tal /temeljenje /kontaktni tlaki /slojeviti polprostor /posedki /ploščat temelj

BiblioEntry.Title: Numerična in računalniška matematika. Del 3, Stabilne numerične metode za reševanje sistema diferencialnih enačb
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Numerična in računalniška matematika. Del 3, Stabilne numerične metode za reševanje sistema diferencialnih enačb / nosilec Andrej Kmet ; sodelavca Bojan Orel, V. V. Bobkov

Publisher.PublisherName: Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1984
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prvem delu te naloge so podrobno razložene kvazi-Newtonove metode za reševanje sistema nelinearnih enačb in za določanje minima pozitivnega funkcionala. Te metode uporabljamo pri numerični realizaciji implicitnih metod za reševanje nelinearnih togih sistemov navadnih diferencialnih enačb prvega reda. V drugem delu so razvite nove metode za numerično reševanje sistemov diferencialnih enačb. Analizirana je vsklajenost numeričnih rešitev, ki jih dobimo z uporabo novih metod in klasičnih metod, z rešitvami določenega razreda sistemov diferencialnih enačb. Tretji del vsebuje nekaj novih metod za reševanje navadnih diferencialnih enačb novega reda in za reševanje začetnih nalog pri navadni diferencialni enačbi drugega reda. Nekatere metode so posplošene za reševanje sistema navadnih diferencialnih enačb prvega reda.

In the first part of this work a few forms of Quasi-Newton method for the solution of the systems of nonlinear equations and for the minimisation of the positive functional are explained. This methods are being used in the numerical realisation of implicit methods for the solution of the system of ordinary differential equations. The second part includes some new methods for the solution of a system of ordinary differential equations. For a special class of differential equations the boundedness and quasi-periodicity of solutions and the corresponding behaviour of the aproximate solution obtained by new and classical methods are proved. In the third part some new methods for the solution of the first order ordinary differential equations and of the initial value problem in second order differential equations are included. Some methods are extended to the solution of the system of ordinary differential equations.

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1984
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V analizo interakcije zgradbe in slojevite elastične podlage so vključeni še temeljni nosilci. Računalniški program je prirejen za nosilce in preiskušen na konkretnih zgledih.
The interaction between the structure and the foundation soil for foundation beams and slabs is analysed. A computer program is developed.

BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Numerična in računalniška matematika. Del 1, Metode za numerično reševanje sistemov navadnih diferencialnih enačb z razširjenim območjem stabilnosti / nosilec: Zvonimir Bohte ; sodelavci: Vladimir V. Bobkov, Andrej Kmet, Bojan Orel, Marko Petkovšek, Gabrijel Tomšič

Publisher.PublisherName: Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1983
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prvem delu naloge je podrobno obravnavanih in analiziranih nakaj variant nove eksponentne metode za reševanje začetnih nalog pri sistemih navadnih diferencialnih enačb prvega reda. Drugi del vsebuje nekaj novih metod za reševanje začetnih nalog pri navadni diferencialni enačbi drugega reda. V tretjem delu pa je podrobno razložena kvazi-Newtonova metoda za reševanje sistemov nelinearnih enačb, ki nastanejo pri numerični realizaciji implicitnih metod za reševanje sistemov navadnih diferencialnih enačb prvega reda.

In the first part of this work some versions of the new exponential method for the solution of the initial value problems in the first order systems of ordinary differential equations are treated and analysed. The second part includes some new methods for the solution of the initial value problems in second order differential equations. In the third part the Quasi-Newton method for the solution of systems of nonlinear equations arising in the numerical realization of implicit methods for the solution of the first order systems of ordinary differential equations.

BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Numerična in računalniška matematika. Del 1, Numerične metode višjega reda z izboljšano vsklajenostjo diferencialne in diferenčne naloge / nosilec Zvonimir Bohte ; sodelavci Vladimir V. Bobkov, Andrej Kmet, Bojan Orel

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1982
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V prvem delu naloge je podan obširen pregled teorije stabilnosti numeričnih metod za reševanje začetnih nalog pri navadnih diferencialnih enačbah. Drugi del vsebuje nekaj znanih in nekaj novih rezultatov v zvezi z razširitvijo območja stabilnosti pri metodah višjega reda in v zvezi z ocenjevanjem globalne napake. Tretji del je članek, ki vsebuje glavne izvirne rezultate v zvezi z regularizacijo znanih numeričnih metod.

The first part of this work is an extensive survey of the theory of stability of numerical methods for the solution of initial value problem in ordinary differential equations. In the second part some known and some new results concerning the extension of the stability domain in some higher order methods and the estimation of the global error are included. The third part is a preprint of a paper which contains the main original results in connection with the regularization of some known methods.

BiblioEntry.Title: Numerično reševanje večparametričnih problemov lastnih vrednosti
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Numerično reševanje večparametričnih problemov lastnih vrednosti / nosilec: Zvonimir Bohte ; sodelavci: Gabrijel Tomšič ... [et al.]

Publisher.PublisherName: Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko

BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : Inštitut za matematiko, fiziko in mehaniko, 1979
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V tej nalogi so obravnavane numerične metode za reševanje večparametričnih problemov lastnih vrednosti. Pri reševanju algebraičnega problema so opisani štirje novi algoritmi za ekonomično in stabilno računanje odvoda determinante. Pri reševanju diferencialnega problema so obravnavani izreki o eksistenci in oscilacijskem vedenju lastnih funkcij ter dokazan nov izrek o asimptotičnih razvojih napak za diferenčno metodo. Pri reševanju integralskega problema so razložene nekatere metode, ki prevedejo problem na algebraični. Vsa izvajanja so ilustrirana na numeričnih zgledih.

In this work numerical methods for the solution of multiparameter eigenvalue problems are discussed. In the solution of the algebraic problem four new efficient and stable algorithms for the calculation of the derivative of the determinant are described. In the solution of the differential problem the existence and oscillation properties of the eigenfunctions are treated, and a new theorem on the assymptotic expansions of the errors in the difference method proved. In the solution of the integral problem some methods which reduce the problem to the algebraic one are explained. All discussions are accompanied by illustrative numerical examples.

BiblioEntry.Title: Laboratorijske raziskave deformabilnosti tal v pogojih kontinuirnega, diskontinuirnega in dinamičnega obremenjevanja
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Laboratorijske raziskave deformabilnosti tal v pogojih kontinuirnega, diskontinuirnega in dinamičnega obremenjevanja / nosilca: Ivan Sovinc, Geza Vogrinčič ; sodelavci: Bogo Simončič ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : RSS : IMFM, 1978
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Podana je vzporeditev kompresijskih preiskav, narejenih v edometrih različnih konstrukcij (z mehaničnim obremenjevanjem preko togega bata in s hidravličnim obremenjevanjem preko fleksibilne gumijaste membrane) ter v triosnih aparatih za primer kontinuirnega in diskontinuirnega načina obremenjevanja. Za vzporeditev preiskav s ponavljajočo se in statično deviatorsko napetostjo je bilo preiskanih večje število drobnozrnatih nekoherentnih vzorcev zemljine v posebej v ta namen izdelanem dinamičnem triosnem aparatu. Čeprav kažejo rezultati opravljenih preiskav na razlike tako glede na konstrukcijo aparatov kakor tudi glede na način obremenjevanja, bi bilo koristno, da se začeto delo nadaljuje in nato analizira vpliv razlik na račune posedanja statično in dinamično obremenjenih temeljev objektov.

The comparison of some consolidation tests carried out in different sets of oedometers (mechanically loaded, hidraulically pressurised) and in the triaxial cells varying the load increase is given and analyzed. Triaxial compression tests were conducted to evaluate the relation between deformation characteristics under static loads and repeated loading, paying attention to the initial void ratio and to the excess pore pressure caused by the repeated loading.

BiblioEntry.Title: Konstrukcija spektralnih metod z neperiodičnimi trigonometričnimi vrstami : doktorska disertacija
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Konstrukcija spektralnih metod z neperiodičnimi trigonometričnimi vrstami : doktorska disertacija / Andrej Perne
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: doktorska disertacija
BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : [A. Perne], 2012

Notes.Dissertation: Univ. Ljubljana, Fak. za matematiko in fiziko, Oddelek za matematiko, Matematika - 3. stopnja

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Ortogonalni polinomi so poleg Fourierove vrste eno izmed orodij, ki se v teoriji aproksimacije najpogosteje uporablja. Posebne lastnosti trigonometričnih funkcij in polinomov zagotavljajo učinkovito računanje ter stabilne in konvergentne numerične rešitve. Spektralne metode so poleg metod končnih razlik in končnih elementov pomembno orodje za reševanje robnih problemov tako pri navadnih kot pri parcialnih diferencialnih enačbah. V prvem delu doktorske disertacije so opisane osnovne lastnosti Fourierove vrste in ortogonalnih polinomov ter nekateri osnovni pristopi za konstrukcijo spektralnih metod z osnovnimi orodji za analizo konvergence in napake. V nadaljevanju sta predstavljeni dve neklasični družini ortogonalnih polinomov, tj. poldomenski polinomi Čebiševa prve in druge vrste ter pripadajoča poldomenska Čebišev-Fourierova vrsta. Obe družini sta konstruuirani z uporabo modificiranega algoritma Čebiševa za izračun rekurzivnih koeficientov v tričlenski rekurzivni formuli. Aproksimacija s kvadratom integrabilnih funkcijs poldomensko Čebišev-Fourierovo vrsto vrne primerljive rezultate kot aproksimacija s Fourierovo vrsto ali z vrsto Čebiševa. V osrednjem delu doktorske disertacije je konstruiran nov razred Čebišev-Fourierovih kolokacijskih spektralnih metod za reševanje linearnih dvo- točkovnih robnih problemov z Dirichletovimi robnimi pogoji, kjer numerično rešitev problema iščemo v obliki odrezane poldomenske Čebišev-Fourierove vrste, spektralne koeficiente pa izračunamo z metodo kolokacije. Analiza konvergence in napake pokaže, da so te metode primerljive s standardnimi, kjer iščemo rešitev v obliki Fourierove vrste za periodične ali v obliki vrste Čebiševa za neperiodične probleme. Nov razred metod konstruiramo tudi za nekatere evolucijske robne probleme, tj. za posplošene toplotne in valovne enačbe. Numerični zgledi potrjujejo teoretične rezultate in prikazujejo primerljivost napake numerične rešitve dobljene z novimi ali s standardnimi metodami. Kljub temu pa je računska zahtevnost neprimerljiva, saj v primeru poldomenske Čebišev-Fourierove vrste ni na voljo orodja za izračun koeficientov, ki bi bilo primerljivo s hitro Fourierovo transformacijo.

Orthogonal polynomials are, along with Fourier series, one of the most widely used tools in the theory of approximation. Specific properties of trigonometric functions and polynomials assure effcient computation as well as stable and convergent numerical solutions. Spectral methods are, besides finite difference and finite element methods, an important tool for solving boundary value problems for ordinary as well as partial differential equaations. In the first part of the doctoral thesis, some basic properties of the Fourier series and orthogonal polynomials as well as some basic approaches for the construction of spectral methods with fundamental tools for convergence and error analysis are described. In the sequel, two non-classical families of orthogonal polynomials are presented, i.e., the half-range Chebyshev polynomials of the first and second kind as well as the corresponding half-range Chebyshev-Fourier series. Both families are constructed via the modified Chebyshev algorithm used for the computation of the recursive coefficients for the three-term recurrence relation. The approximation of square integrable functions with half-range Chebyshev-Fourierseries yields comparable results to the approximation with Fourier or Chebyshev series. In the central part of the doctoral thesis, a new class of Chebyshev-Fourier collocation spectral methods for solving linear two-point boundary value problems with Dirichlet boundary conditions is constructed. We seek for the numerical solution in the form of the truncated half-range Chebyshev-Fourier series, where spectral coefficients are computed using the collocation method. Convergence and error analysis shows that these methods are comparable with standard ones, where the solution is approximated with the Fourier series for periodic or with the Chebyshev series for non-periodic problems. We construct a new class of methods also for some evolutive boundary value problems, i.e., for generalized heat and wave equations. Numerical examples confirm theoretical results and show the comparability of the error of the numerical solution obtained with the new or the standard methods. Yet, computational costs are not comparable, because in the case of half-range Chebyshev-Fourier series there does not exist a tool for the computation of coefficients being comparable with fast Fourier transform.

BiblioEntry.Title: Metode Liejevih grup in parcialne diferencialne enačbe : magistrsko delo
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Metode Liejevih grup in parcialne diferencialne enačbe : magistrsko delo / Andrej Perne
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: magistrsko delo
BiblioEntry.PublisherISBD: Ljubljana : [M. Perne], 2006

Notes.Dissertation: Univ. v Ljubljani, Fak. za matematiko in fiziko, Matematika - raziskovalna smer

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Opišemo konstrukcijo Magnusovih metod za reševanje linearnih navadnih diferencialnih enačb na Liejevih grupah ter štirih razredov metod Liejevih grup za reševanje nelinearnih navadnih diferencialnih enačb na Liejevih grupah. Rešitve s temi metodami v nasprotju z rešitvami z metodami Runge-Kutta ohranjajo ivariante, ki se ohranjajo pri točni rešitvi, prav tako pa dobimo z njimi bolj natančne rezultate, kar preverimo na zgledih, ki so vključeni v magistrsko delo. Te metode nato uporabimo pri reševanju nekaterih linearnih in nelinearnih parcialnih diferencialnih enačb. Te najprej semidiskretiziramo, da dobimo sistem navadnih diferencialnih enačb, ki je lahko linearen ali pa nelinearen, nato pa ga rešimo z ustrezno metodo Liejevih grup. Na numeričnih zgledih si ogledamo delovanje tega postopka, pri katerem smo konstruirali metode četrtega reda.

We present the construction of Magnus methods for solving linear ODEs on Lie groups and four classes of Lie group methods for solving nonlinear ODEs on Lie groups. The solutions obtained with these methods in contrast with the solutions obtained with Runge-Kutta methods, conserve invariants, which are preserved by exact solution. Moreover, we obtain more accurate solutions as it is demonstrated in included numerical examples. Finally, we use these methods for solving some linear and nonlinear partial differential equations. We first semi-discretize them to obtain a system of ODEs, which is linear or nonlinear and after that we solve this system with some Lie group method. Numerical examples show the application of this procedure in which we constructed methods of order four.
